room_title: Escape room "Villain’s Hideout" by Room Escape Time in Houston
review: This was a great time. Had family here from Illionis. We all enjoyed it! Hank (Pat) was great! We will be back. So fun.

room_title: Escape room "Villain’s Hideout" by Room Escape Time in Houston
review: Our team escaped the Villian room and had a blast! Hank (Kristi) was great! Love how she identified each of our leadership skills. Will definitely go again.

room_title: Escape room "Villain’s Hideout" by Room Escape Time in Houston
review: Great experience...challenging puzzles...overall great great time KRISTIE was fantastic as room moderator..I would reccomend coming here to anyone interested...i will be back for Zombies..."Superman"

room_title: Escape room "Villain’s Hideout" by Room Escape Time in Houston
review: This was my first time trying an escape room and it was a great experience. The staff was very accommodating and understanding. They had a great attitude. The rooms were creative and different. We did the villain/superhero room and they said it was their easiest room, but it was still challenging and thought provoking. We had Sloan during for our session and she was helpful, attitude, and overall made our experience a fun one. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone.
